evidence.claim: ProCare adheres to HIPAA regulations ensuring the protection of patient information.
The company focuses on home health services that may involve third-party EHR integrations, although specific EHR details are not disclosed on the site.
They discuss patient data security thoroughly, indicating a technology-oriented approach to handling health information.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement in X12 transactions or EDI use cases found.
